title: Employee Training Program Proposal
summary: Proposal for Q1 2026 technical skills training program for 50 employees. Budget approval required.
documentBody:
Proposal: Technical Skills Enhancement Program - Q1 2026

Objective:
To enhance technical competencies of our development and operations teams through structured training programs.

Program Details:
1. Cloud Infrastructure Training (AWS/Azure)
   - Duration: 40 hours
   - Participants: 20 employees
   - Cost: 3,00,000 BDT

2. DevOps & CI/CD Best Practices
   - Duration: 32 hours
   - Participants: 15 employees
   - Cost: 2,00,000 BDT

3. Advanced Database Management
   - Duration: 24 hours
   - Participants: 15 employees
   - Cost: 1,50,000 BDT

Total Budget: 6,50,000 BDT
Timeline: January - March 2026

Expected Outcomes:
- Improved project delivery times
- Reduced infrastructure costs
- Enhanced team capabilities

Approval required for budget allocation.

history.note: Training program ready for budget approval.
